header.description: Hello - In response to craigslist add - http://sfbay.craigslist.org/pen/sof/5403138556.html
I'm a generalist with knowledge up and down the stack, having released by own native android app, architected numerous systems across many business needs.
In particular I cite my work at Greencharge Networks, in which writing command and controls systems for peak energy mitigation for grid-tied batteries.
